snippet: Senator Rand Paul defended himself from accusations that he lifted wording for a speech from a Wikipedia entry, saying that if dueling were legal in his home state of Kentucky, the accusing journalists would receive a “duel challenge.”
abstract: Senator Rand Paul defended himself from accusations that he lifted wording for a speech from a Wikipedia entry, saying that if dueling were legal in his home state of Kentucky, the accusing journalists would receive a “duel challenge.”

headline.main: Rand Paul Muses About 'Dueling' With His Accusers
